titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BREAST CANCER INVASIVE SIZE GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO 10mm AND LESS THAN 15mm TOTAL - Description

div.p: BREAST CANCER INVASIVE SIZE GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO 10mm AND LESS THAN 15mm TOTAL is the number of invasive breast cancers detected greater than or equal to 10mm and less than 15mm, where the BREAST BIOPSY REFERRAL OUTCOME National Code is 'Positive; i.e. cancer detected - invasive size known'.
